text: vea( ai pli sa) ban niyeay tha saum trong brab khnhom mk tae nih ryy del anak ban leukatamkeung cheang khnhom noh? brasenbae trong ponyearpel aoy khnhom rsa rhautadl thngai barlok khnhom pitchea nung ausateanh kaunchaw robsa ke( aoy daer tamophlauv v nge v ng) leuklengte b ndi ch b nduo ch( nei anak del mean chomnue) bonnaoh
